title: Rotational KE - compare before and after torque

content.prompt: A disk is spinning about its center at a constant, clockwise angular velocity ω. After an external torque is exerted on the disk, the disk spins at a constant, counterclockwise angular velocity -ω. Which of the following claims is true about the rotational kinetic energy of the disk?

choices.label: It is greater after the torque is applied.
It is greater before the torque is applied.
It is the same before and after the torque is applied.
It cannot be determined when the rotational kinetic energy is greater without additional information.

unit.text: 6: Energy and Momentum of Rotating Systems

skill.text: 3.B: Apply an appropriate law, definition, theoretical relationship, or model to make a claim.
